name: agent-protocols-marketplace
description: Production-validated protocols, agent definitions, and automation frameworks for systematic AI-assisted software development. Originally created for .NET migrations, these protocols are universally applicable to any software project requiring structured agent collaboration.

plugins.name: agent-protocols
plugins.description: Complete suite of 10 production-validated protocols, 6 specialized agents, and 5 automation scripts for systematic software development, testing, documentation, and security scanning
